website_summaries.verdict: With no breaking-in needed, these comfortable sandals are adventure-ready right out of the box.
pros: Adjustable straps for a perfect fit
Leather uppers with buckle strap and hook-and-loop closure

customer_reviews.title: Mephisto Changed the Front Strap Length!
customer_reviews.text: Was very excited about receiving my new pair of Mephisto Shark sandals. I’ve had a pair for 15 years and had them refurbished at Mephisto twice. It was time to retire the old favorites. Unfortunately when the new pair arrived I was disappointed to find the front Velcro straps to be different than my original pair. The front (over toes) strap is too short to close!! I’m hoping this is an unusual defect, and will contact Mephisto to see if they changed the length of the front strap. As compared to my original pair it is inches shorter! You would need a very narrow foot to fasten the strap.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Zillman

customer_reviews.title: Heel strap not adjustable too loose in heel.
customer_reviews.text: I've had a pair of the original Mephisto sandals since 2001 - purchased in Paris. While a bit on the heavy side, they fit well and lasted until this year when they experienced rubber fatigue. They were adjustable with velcro strips across the toe, arch and heel area. Bought a pair of All Rounder sandals and they were like the original Mephisto except made in Vietnam rather than Strasbourg and synthetic and leather rather than all leather. The present Mephistos came up on Amazon at a good price so I ordered them as they are all leather. Only adjustable at the toe and arch and not the heel - makes them too big.
customer_reviews.author: Luigi Facotti

customer_reviews.title: Great sandals And all day comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I first bought these 20 years ago due to a broken toe. I didn’t want to wear the boot the doctor gave me and he said these would work as well. They used to make the women’s version, for some reason they discontinued them. Fortunately, for me, the men’s size 6 works perfectly! I have not been able to find a sandal that I can comfortably wear with/without socks. True, they are not all that attractive but who cares they are sooo comfortable. Great to wear walking, shopping or any other activity. They are pricey and they are well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Wylendia R Eastman

customer_reviews.title: I am breaking them in but they are already comfortable and support my foot like a Mephisto
customer_reviews.text: The fact that the back strap is part of the over the foot strap is important to me. Previous sandals of these types had velcro back straps and they wore out prematurely--even after I had trimmed the velcro. The sandal is leather and well built. I am breaking them in but they are already comfortable and support my foot like a Mephisto. I walk in humid heat with a big dog and I appreciate the traction when she lunges at cats.
customer_reviews.author: CO transplant

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price...not cheap but you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: My second pair after 10 years and if anything these are better than the first pair I owned and wore to death. They are a comfortable all day fit and allow for stable walking on almost any surface (beach sand not so much). I suffer with a painful knee replacement and yet these sandals allow me to walk in nearly normal comfort. I have tried other sandals but Mephisto has them all beat.
customer_reviews.author: Wally

customer_reviews.title: Bigger then expected both in size and in comfort, JUST AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: Though they are slightly bigger than expected, I received european size 43, which is 9.5 and I ordered 9 I think those are the most comfortable sandals I have owned to dates. They even included a paid posting label for when the time come to get any of the various part to get refresh/repaired. I wore them for a full day and they are just the awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Remoris

customer_reviews.title: Top quality
customer_reviews.text: I got my first pair 10-12 years ago for a trip to Thailand. Best pair of sandals I have ever owned-very comfortable and extremely durable. I've worn mine at the beach, tourist walking, and working out in the yard. Have gotten them soaked in rain and saltwater-in other words, used and abused them and still comfortable and holding up. Now they are a little faded on the straps and the edges of the footbed have turned up some, so I ordered another pair. Will keep my first pair for the beach and yard work and the new pair for when appearances are important.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd pair of Mephisto sandals I have purchased online...so I knew that the size was going to be a perfect fit. Very comfortable sandal, extremely well made...I expect to get many years of wear out of these. Buy with confidence.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Chandler

customer_reviews.title: Good, comfortable sandals
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of this type of sandal, as the first pair had lost a heel insert a few years ago. They are comfortable for everyday wear and will last several years.
customer_reviews.author: Roger W. Reini

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful quality shoe
customer_reviews.text: I had/have a pair of these sandals and have been wearing them for years. I like them so much, I'm afraid someday they'll discontinue them and I just wanted another pair so I will have at least one for the rest of my life.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen L. Zaslaw

customer_reviews.title: No width information given on sandals.Over priced/
customer_reviews.text: Closure snaps difficult to operate due to wideness of my foot and narrowness of strap. Very annoying when putting sandals on and taking them off.Time consuming too. These sandals are grossly over-priced. I paid an extra $100 for the Mephisto brand name. I should know better.
customer_reviews.author: Robert A. Schu

customer_reviews.title: Best Quality and Fit
customer_reviews.text: My husband is very happy with these shoes. He has problems with his feet and these shows are very comfortable for him!
customer_reviews.author: Jan from California

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: My husband is loving these sandals. He has flat feet. Difficult to fit him with comfortable shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Sandal, But Buckles on Wrong Side of Shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I've had these sandals for over a year and like them very much – very well made, very durable, comfortable, goo looking shoe. However, I find them hard to buckle. The buckles would be a lot easier to fasten if they were on the instep side of the shoe so that you could easily reach the buckles and see what you're doing by crossing your legs. As it is, you have to do it pretty much by feel using only one hand. Might be easier if you're really flexible, which I ain't! ;-)
customer_reviews.author: R. D. Collins

customer_reviews.title: My favorite shoe
customer_reviews.text: I first came across this footware when I Googled "most comfortable shoe in the world" some years ago. Now I'm ready for another pair and purchased again. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: jhimmel

customer_reviews.title: Big change
customer_reviews.text: Not the same quality as years passed. Straps to short,returned
customer_reviews.author: bzipper5

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I think this might this is my sixth pair of these shoes and I keep coming back to them because they are extremely comfortable for a sandal and the thickness of the song provides bar comfort for all day walking. I specially find them useful when traveling in warm climates.
customer_reviews.author: Slightly Caffeinated

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Foot Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Just what my decrepit feet need. They are supportive and comfortable. My last pair was long lasting.
customer_reviews.author: RicR2

customer_reviews.title: Best sandals made
customer_reviews.text: Best sandals on the planet. Had a pair that lasted 15 years. This is my second pair. Most comfortable and provides excellent support.
customer_reviews.author: Bobdi

customer_reviews.title: Good sandal if you can afford it
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice sandal. It is similar to the quality of the original Allrounder before Mephisto removed their name and cheapened it. Nice but overpriced!
customer_reviews.author: meagain

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny! I was on the fence about spending so much for a pair of sandals. But after reading all of the positive reviews, I decided to shell out the cash. Best pair of sandals I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Karl Hentschel

customer_reviews.title: Mephisto Sandals
customer_reviews.text: Fits better when wearing socks; ergo, not good if you use it along a beach or summer time walks. Since it's winter time, I wear it in the house with socks.
customer_reviews.author: Joey Jaug

customer_reviews.title: almost the best their is
customer_reviews.text: If the Roman soldiers had these they would still be around today.
customer_reviews.author: Nadine W.

customer_reviews.title: Great comfort and great support.
customer_reviews.text: Got these as a gift for our son, and he raved about how comfortable they are.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Mephisto Sandals, purchased on Amazon, were a size too small.  Will reorder a size larger
customer_reviews.text: The Mephisto Sandals were a gift for my husband. They were a size too small. He plans to order another pair just like them only a size large. He really loves similar sandals that have worn out over several years, and wants a new pair.
customer_reviews.author: Judith

customer_reviews.title: They are amazing. However they do eventually wear out
customer_reviews.text: I have worn this make of sandals for 15 years. They are amazing. However they do eventually wear out. Will always wear this brand
customer_reviews.author: Don G

customer_reviews.title: Always buy the best you can afford
customer_reviews.text: Mephisto shoes and sandals are the best quality I have encountered. You pay a higher price, but they last longer and keep their shape. If you enjoy good shoes, think about Mephisto. They are not the cheapest, but they are the best.
customer_reviews.author: NORMAN

customer_reviews.title: My husbands purchased this same model 15 years ago in ...
customer_reviews.text: My husbands purchased this same model 15 years ago in Spain and just realized he had worn them out. He was thrilled to be able to replace them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If your feet hurt
customer_reviews.text: I have nurapathy and Mephisto sandals are the only thing I can wear and be comfortable The Shark fit is great
customer_reviews.author: J. Slater

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise the Shark is the most comfortable shoe that I have ever worn
customer_reviews.text: What Mephisto needs is to sell sandals with metatarsal support, which is now imperative for my feet. Otherwise the Shark is the most comfortable shoe that I have ever worn. I have bought this show 4 times now.
customer_reviews.author: David Shannahoff

customer_reviews.title: Wow, comfort and quality in a SANDAL!
customer_reviews.text: I don't even know what to say about Mephisto any more other than, their quality and comfort is unsurpassed by no one. From the minute I first put on these sandals, I realized they were just as comfortable as my Mephisto loafers. I can feel the difference between my mid-level sandals I've owned for a few years now and this new wonderous pair that I know will be my go-to footwear this summer.
customer_reviews.author: John Dempsey

customer_reviews.title: This is my second sandal from Mephisto
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing mephisto shoes since 1994 including Marlon,llgar, Dribbler, Match, Storm, Alligator..... you name it. I love Mephisto and only wear Mephisto. Comparing it with Alligator, Alligator seems softer on the sole and only less than half price of Shark. Of course, I only wear Shark for one week. I do not want to give you a pre-matured conclusion saying that Alligator is a better buy yet. But, definitely, Mephisto maintains its high quality and comfort wearing for every single shoes I bought and wear. Go, the world's finest walking shoes, Mephisto.
customer_reviews.author: Jerming Shei

customer_reviews.title: Mephisto Sandal
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of Mephisto Sandals. The first pair I purchased in Honolulu about 1 years ago and they are still in good shape, but was looking for a women's pair for my wife and saw these at a better price than what I paid and bought them. THE most comfortable sandal I've ever bought!
customer_reviews.author: kevin reilly

customer_reviews.title: Best Mehisto sandals yet!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these sandals. He said they are lighter weight than his old All Rounders. Yes, they are pricey, but they should last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: LynnC

customer_reviews.title: so happy I did
customer_reviews.text: Never spent this much for sandals, so happy I did, they are very comfortable and look great
customer_reviews.author: steve d

customer_reviews.title: Mephisto Shark
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing these sandals for about 12 years. This is my 4th pair and they are better than ever. They are the most comfortable sandals I have ever worn and I probably will never buy another brand and model. The fit was exactly what I ordered size 11 US an 45 European. The price was about $40-$50 dollars cheaper than anywhere else. I ordered them on June 27th and received them on July 1st (over weekend) with 2 day prime. How can you beat that? If you are a doubter go into a Nordstrom's or Mephisto store and just try them on and judge for yourself. 5 stars Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: C vail

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sandals, I have bought 6 pairs over the years. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: J Garza

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: These are the best sandals I've ever had. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Maker of Images

customer_reviews.title: I have used Mephistos for years and am never disappointed. ..
customer_reviews.text: The one small thing I would say is that the adjustment strap should have more latitude to tighten up over time. Things to stretch. Otherwise a great sandal!
customer_reviews.author: D. H Klassen

customer_reviews.title: Comfort, comfort, comfort
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband and he started wearing them right out of the box. Said they are incredibly comfortable. He wears a size 9 1/2 and I got him the 9 which fits nicely. The only complaint is the ankle strap Velcro doesn't allow him to get as tight a fit as he would prefer, but he said there's no rubbing or discomfort. When I suggested we try another sandal he said there couldn't be another as comfortable as this one, so that says it all!
customer_reviews.author: Jane A. Atkinson

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic comfort
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic comfort. My last pare lasted over ten years. Wear them a lot. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Herb Stoller

customer_reviews.title: Get a 1/2 size to a full size larger, no sore spots
customer_reviews.text: Best Sandler ever made and even send them in when they need to be resoled.
customer_reviews.author: Trent

customer_reviews.title: Love em great
customer_reviews.text: Seacond pair, 1st pair had been reworked for extended life. Love em great sandals
customer_reviews.author: Robert S Barton

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Never spent this much for sandals in my life but you really do get what you pay form. Fit well, very comfortable and so much better than the K-Mart junk. I love the new sandals.
customer_reviews.author: Donald P.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and comfort
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair of Sharks. Comfort from the time these are put on and no breaking in required. Great for walking - my Sharks are well traveled and get a lot of use Normally I wear a 9.5 - 10 US but with Mephisto a US 9/EU 43 is perfect - so you may need to verify your size.
customer_reviews.author: ChiBuyer

customer_reviews.title: Quality is great! Sizing compared with other sandals I own
customer_reviews.text: Quality is great! Sizing compared with other sandals I own, they are aboiut a half size large. I am confident the replacements will be, perfect. The replacements are as expected, excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Steven C. Mikkelsen

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my Expectations!
customer_reviews.text: Wearing sandals is new for me and I am very pleased with the comfort, style, and convenience of wearing them!
customer_reviews.author: Johnny B

customer_reviews.title: They are awesome. It feels like an Angel is caressing my ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my 4th pair of Mephisto's Shark Fit Sandals. They are awesome. It feels like an Angel is caressing my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Eric von Rosenberg

customer_reviews.title: The plushest sandals available
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and highly adjustable for best fit. Expensive but worth it when on sale.
customer_reviews.author: Tomas Ganz

customer_reviews.title: like floating in air
customer_reviews.text: wearing these sandals, I feel like I'm walking on air. they sure are comfortable. my size was pretty much right on as far as initial fit. only minor adjustments for personal preference. but that was what I expected. As compared to other sandals I have these had no break-in period. and for the past week they have become second nature wear them. a little pricy but I feel they should last years from now. and a clean design of the sandal itself. kinda like the Bentley of shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Don Reeves

customer_reviews.title: Great Casual Sandals!
customer_reviews.text: I had to go a size smaller since these sandals fit big. Otherwise, they were very comfortable and well-made.
customer_reviews.author: Ernest Matsumoto

customer_reviews.title: Shark Gladiators are comfortable and stable.
customer_reviews.text: Second pair I've owned, I love these sandals. Very comfortable from the minute you put them on. Would leave on vacation without them.
customer_reviews.author: Terry W

customer_reviews.title: The sandals are elegant and very well made but I ...
customer_reviews.text: The sandals are elegant and very well made but I have not yet found the exact adjustment that will be ideal for comfort over long wear periods. Since there ae several adjustment modes I am not abandoning hope that I will soon find just the right combination for long~term comfort.
customer_reviews.author: John A.Meine

customer_reviews.title: More durable that you think
customer_reviews.text: I love Mephisto shoes and continue to believe they are well worth their extra cost. My sandals have been punished by many months of bare foot travels in all conditions. Due to some ( unwarranted I'm sure ) negative comments from my wife about my sandals taking on an odor I decided to throw them in the washing machine and see what happened. I am sure this is not manufacturer recommended but I let the sandals dry in the sun after their washing and they came out like new! Happy wife and like new sandals!
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: An all day shoe for warm weather
customer_reviews.text: Really a bit more than a sandal. Think a full shoe cut away to a comfortable, supportive, long lasting sandal.
customer_reviews.author: R. Coppersmith

customer_reviews.title: Mephisto Sandal
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this sandal as a replacement of the same sandal which I purchased a couple of years ago. This is the most comfortable sandal that I have ever worn.
customer_reviews.author: Ted T. Fukushima

customer_reviews.title: The best sandal I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: I live in AZ. I wear them year round. They mold themselves to my feet. The sole is good for almost any terrain. They are infinitely adjustable. Just plain great.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: BEst sandals ever
customer_reviews.text: BEst sandals ever. The great thing is that they can be resoled after a few years. High price, but long lasting quality.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Z

customer_reviews.title: Well worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable and yet attractive sandals. I wear them everyday and love how they feel. My wife thinks they look great.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Goldsmith

customer_reviews.title: The perfect sandal
customer_reviews.text: This sandal is great for even the most sensitive feet. The fit is adjustable for wide and narrow feet. The comfort and support level is well worth the price you will pay.
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: exquisite Amazon experience
customer_reviews.text: All of my comments fit all of the positive remarks about the most comfortable shoe I have ever worn. It is the only shoe I will wear until the weather gets cold. I will try it at church but not if I wear a coat and tie. Jesus wore sandals! Too bad they were not Mephistos. Can not say enough about them. You get what you pay for in his case. Exactly what I imagined. The blogs were a great help iny decision, but was aware of the quality when I bought my wife a pair a few years ago. Get out of the box. The box is overrated anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence A. Buckland, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy
customer_reviews.text: The most comfortable sandal I've ever worn. It's like walking on air.
customer_reviews.author: FORREST GOODLETTE

customer_reviews.title: Another winner from Mephisto
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased many Mephisto shoes. All have been excellent. I really love the Shark. Both the upper and lower foot straps are adjustable. The sole is extremely comfortable. The inside of the straps that meet your skin or sock are very soft so they won t irritate the foot. Overall, this is one of the best shoes or sandals I have ever worn, They are worth every penny I paid for them.
customer_reviews.author: will

customer_reviews.title: Soft and hard but just too big
customer_reviews.text: From the front of the heel forward they are the softest sandal I have even worn, but the heel back is like granite. These I had tried a size bigger but they were too big, so I picked these. They were the smallest Amazon offered and they are still bigger than I would like. I'd been wearing them for a couple hours before I decided they were too big, so I have very expensive sandals that I only wear for a few hours at a time.
customer_reviews.author: P. Dubuque

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable for Everyday Use
customer_reviews.text: Bought my first pair in 2004 and wore them out after 10+ years. They are expensive but super comfortable and built to last. Great footwear!
customer_reviews.author: Randall B.

customer_reviews.title: perfect sandals
customer_reviews.text: I tried other brands and none were satisfactory to my fussy feet. These fit perfect and are the most comfortable sandals I have ever experienced. These are the best of the best to me.
customer_reviews.author: K. A. Smith

customer_reviews.title: The sandals are great! The European size 40 is a US-7
customer_reviews.text: The sandals are great! The European size 40 is a US-7. The box says US-6 which is normally a European 39. My original order was for a US-7 and I received 41 which is an 8. Save shipping costs by correcting the conversion.
customer_reviews.author: Peder F. Engebretson

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality But....
customer_reviews.text: Was excited to get these. Straight out of the box I realized why these cost so much. The quality and craftsmanship is superb! However after I put them on I just didn't like them. They were heavy for sandals and the thick leather straps and bottom were making my feet sweat within a minute and this was inside not walking around. Overall they had a heavy "clunky" feel. I want something lightweight and cool for the summer weather. I sent these back and got some Ecco sandals which I love.
customer_reviews.author: John Shiva

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional comfort and quality!
customer_reviews.text: My second pair of Mephisto Sharks! The most comfortable sandals I have ever worn. Great support! I have knee injuries and lower back problems, and these shoes are great.
customer_reviews.author: jet1947

customer_reviews.title: love them, i bought a pair twenty years ago
customer_reviews.text: love them, i bought a pair twenty years ago. still good and got a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Sandals
customer_reviews.text: This is the 6 pair of these I have had over the last 12 years. They are comfortable and durable, best sandals I have ever owned
customer_reviews.author: Stafford McKergow

customer_reviews.title: My husband is beyond happy with his new sandals.
customer_reviews.text: He has trouble with his feet and I finally talked him into spending some money on himself. He and his feet are very happy now.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Great comfortable sandals
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality shoes. Soft, comfortable out of the box. Good skin and very comfortable sitting on the foot. Size is slightly larger than advertised.
customer_reviews.author: slbn2011

customer_reviews.title: Love my new sandals
customer_reviews.text: This is so far the best sandals I've ever bought. It was really comfortable and and it match with every jeans, or shorts you wear. I will definitely recommend these pair of sandals.
customer_reviews.author: yrreg

customer_reviews.title: they are extremely comfortable, compared to other sandals
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift to my husband. And he loves them! He says they fit perfectly, they are extremely comfortable, compared to other sandals. He is able to wear them for a long length of time without his back hurting.
customer_reviews.author: Metairie Girl

customer_reviews.title: Iove them
customer_reviews.text: These are like your most comfortable shoes but are sandels had to get a size smaller 7us than my normal shoe size 8
customer_reviews.author: Phillip M.

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but worth it
customer_reviews.text: I bought the new pair to replace a pair that finally started to fall apart after about 26 years. They appear to be exactly the same. Quite comfortable and durable. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: bots491

customer_reviews.title: These are excellent sandals and a great replacement for my old Mephisto ...
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent sandals and a great replacement for my old Mephisto sandals except for one thing. My old sandals were a Europe size 42 (American size 9.5) and the new ones are a Europe size 44. I had to go with the size 10 because they stopped making half-sizes. That was a mistake. The new sandals are excellent,but they'll never fit as well as my old ones. I deducted a star for that.
customer_reviews.author: 3Star

customer_reviews.title: Best sandals
customer_reviews.text: Living in AZ, I wear sandals very often but have never found a pair that were completely satisfactory. Usually it takes months to wear in, often with pieces of moleskin or bandage to cover the "rough" spots. The Mephisto were comfortable, walkable, and had no rough spots. I have other Mephisto shoes so thought I would try their sandals, great choice!
customer_reviews.author: Martin f.Malkin

customer_reviews.title: Best Sandals Ever... I'm not a corporate stooge, this is legit lol!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best sandals I have ever owned. I wear sandals 8 months a year so durability and comfort are a must. The Shark has both. My sister makes fun of me for wearing "Jesus Sandals." I reply "yea, but I'm comfortable as hell!" I've owned a certain brand of sandal for 12 years. This Mephisto Shark is better than my other three pair over 12 years. Highly recommended, if expensive. Remember, you get what you pay for lol! ;-) Jeremy
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: You can't pay too much for quality...
customer_reviews.text: I have owned several pairs of Mephisto shoes... And it's really true a you get what you pay for... Comfort, quality, and durability... Although this isn't a small amount for a pair of sandals, you find find that they will last a very long time, and they only get better with age...
customer_reviews.author: Skip

customer_reviews.title: Very pleasante.
customer_reviews.text: As I am an older man (65 years old) and naturally I need a great confort for my foot, when I go out for a long walking day as I am now in NY. Every day in actual trip of vacancies, I walk a lot for shopping and visit many places in this esplendorous city.
customer_reviews.author: Paulo Jordao

customer_reviews.title: The shark sandels sent to me have mostly man made material in the tops and the Velcro adjustments are too limited to be useful.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the MephistoShark sandals so that my existing shark sandals can rest.My shark sandals have all leather tops and ample Velcro adjustments.The shark sandels sent to me have mostly man made material in the tops and the Velcro adjustments are too limited to be useful. I have lymphadema in my feet and legs caused by cancer radiation therapy,so my shoe toe and arch straps can't bind.Unfortunately the Mephisto Shark sandals, bought and returned, couldn't be adjusted to fit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: shark
customer_reviews.text: Worlds most comfortable sandals. My last pair of Mephisto sandals lasted 12 years. They run a 1/2 to large,all Mephistos do.
customer_reviews.author: paul

customer_reviews.title: Let's take a moment and thank those who helped us get where we are
customer_reviews.text: You can spend millions to have the best house, yacht, car, even cat. I've done it all. What do you have to spend for the best sandal in the world? Where do you find it? It took me a journey to the Maldives to find the answer to that question. Nights on the edge of fire, danger, and people as cold as ice. RIP Iliad, my friend who died helping me that night. I got him for you buddy and he couldn't even look me in the eye. Current Music: Gato Barbieri - Europa
customer_reviews.author: Jon D

customer_reviews.title: Comfort in style.
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my husband based on the most comfortable shoe ever worn statement. He did give me some grief because of the price, but once he tried them on there was no returning them! I told him to think of it as an investment in his feet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable sandals I have ever purchased right out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: My current favorite sandals. I have multiple pairs of Finn Comfort and Naot and wore Birkenstocks for over 20 years and these Mephisto Sharks are my current favorite--most comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Scott M. Simms

customer_reviews.title: Mens Shark Sandal
customer_reviews.text: I have purchesed many different sandals.The Mephisto sandal is the most comfortable sandal made.The sandal also is very rugged.My last pair lasted 5years.Pricey but well worth it....
customer_reviews.author: Michael Pleasant

customer_reviews.title: The best sandal
customer_reviews.text: The SHARK model is the best sandal ever made in my opinion. Do not bother with any other sandal brand or other Mephisto sandal.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob P. Cox

customer_reviews.title: my second pair and fits as good if not better than my first pair I bought five years ago with one recrapht AAAAAA+++++++++
customer_reviews.text: items like these brings back the faith. That we can high end sandals at a reasonable price this is a case where if you spend more your really are going to get the quality to back up the sales and last and last
customer_reviews.author: Barry Rosenberg

customer_reviews.title: We were very disappointed in these sandals
customer_reviews.text: We were very disappointed in these sandals. My husband has worn these sandals in the past and they lasted "forever". However, I purchased these for my husband for Christmas, 2014 and they have already torn. (See attached picture.) We are unable to return them because of the Amazon policy, but actually I don't think this is Amazon's issue. What happened to Mephistos quality?
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: The Fit
customer_reviews.text: Commmfortable from the moment you first try them on! Great shoes, I highly recommend them to anyone who's looking for sandals.
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied for sure!

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and its great
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend it. Its very comfortable, very soft and fit very I will keep buying this brand again and again
customer_reviews.author: MSA

customer_reviews.title: Up to Mephisto's Best
customer_reviews.text: Happy with them. They are comfortable, good quality and rather good looking. Up to Mephisto's best. Javier
customer_reviews.author: Javier

customer_reviews.title: A Wide instead of a Medium should have been fine.
customer_reviews.text: Too Bad Mephisto does not offer W. I think M is too narrow for mt feet. So I returned it. I liked the comfort otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Carol and Harry

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable for sensitive feet.
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive feet and find Shark Fit uncomfortable. They are pretty expensive to throw away, and the latch system is not easy to use. I find $30+ Crocks clogs most comfortable and ugliest shoes I own.
customer_reviews.author: BAKNYC

customer_reviews.title: If you real old you might like.
customer_reviews.text: Big bulky old person shoes. Sent them Back. If you real old you might like.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Zakada

product_meta.title: Mephisto Men's Shark Sandals
product_meta.description:
You love your sports sandals, but they are sometimes too casual. And you rely on your leather loafer, but sometimes that seems too hot or formal. This is a perfect "meet in the middle" shoe. The leather upper is supple and features sleek adjustable straps over the foot and around the ankle for a great fit. Meanwhile, the supportive and cushioned sole and footbed you've come to expect from Mephisto will provide a comfortable walking experience. Pair with pants or shorts for a handsome warm-weather look.

Mephisto makes some of the finest walking shoes on earth. Their comfort, support and durability are recognized wherever people are serious about walking. For more than three decades, Mephisto has been on the forefront of walking-shoe innovation. Mephisto’s natural products are handmade of leather, latex, cork and rubber.
feature_bullets: Supportive sandal featuring quick-release buckle strap adjustable hook-and-loop closure over vamp
